#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,a,b,i,j,an;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int data[105][105];
		int dp[105][105]={0};
		cin >> a >> b;
		for(i=1;i<=a;i++)
		{
			for(j=1;j<=b;j++)
				cin >> data[i][j];
		}
		dp[1][1]=1;
		for(i=1;i<=a;i++)
		{
			for(j=1;j<=b;j++)
			{
				if(i==1 && j==1)
					continue;
				if(data[i][j]>data[i-1][j] && dp[i-1][j]!=0)
					dp[i][j]=max(dp[i][j],dp[i-1][j]+1);
				if(data[i][j]>data[i][j-1] && dp[i][j-1]!=0)
					dp[i][j]=max(dp[i][j],dp[i][j-1]+1);
			}
		}
		an=0;
		for(i=1;i<=a;i++)
		{
			for(j=1;j<=b;j++)
				an=max(an,dp[i][j]);
		}
		cout << an << "\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
